hero_title: Calm, comfortable rest — capsules for your journey, with <bold>{{brand}}</bold>
hero_subtitle: No long lines, 24/7 access, fast check-in, and recharge in clean, safe capsules.
intro_paragraph: Qonoq capsules provide private and quiet rest with fast check-in, hourly rates, fresh linens, charging points, wake-up alarm and 24/7 service
customer_rating_text: Highly rated by guests on major platforms
wake_up_service_text: Smart wake-up so you never oversleep
amenities_inside_title: Comfort inside the capsule and hotel service
bedding_text: A soft mattress and a clean pillow
charging_point_text: Easy access to power for devices
experience_paragraph: A capsule hotel is a modern type of accommodation where, instead of regular rooms, guests are offered individual sleeping capsules. Each capsule is a compact, enclosed private space for sleep and rest, equipped with everything necessary: a mattress, lighting, ventilation, power outlets, and space for personal belongings.
capsules_page_title: Quiet Capsules — calm zone, comfort sleep
capsules_standard_description: The standard capsule is a private, quiet, and secure mini-space designed for short rest at the airport. It includes an orthopedic bed, ventilation, adjustable lighting, and charging ports.
capsules_family_description: The family capsule is a spacious, private, and secure mini-space designed for two people to rest comfortably at the airport. It includes a larger orthopedic bed, individual ventilation, adjustable lighting, and charging ports.
footer_description: Qonoq Capsule offers a calm, private, and modern space to rest, delivering quality comfort and exceptional service.
footer_contact_address: Inside Tashkent International Airport, near Terminal 2, Tashkent city
standard_description: A practical and comfortable capsule designed for peace, simplicity, and privacy, featuring a cozy 1.2m x 2m bed — ideal for solo travelers seeking rest just a few minutes from Tashkent International Airport.
family_description: A spacious and comfortable family capsule offering privacy and relaxation, with a 2.4m x 2m bed — perfect for couples or small families just minutes from Tashkent International Airport.
contact_hotel_address: Tashkent International Airport, Departure Area, 2nd Floor
contact_header_subtitle: We're here to help you with any questions or assistance you may need
contact_alert_text: For urgent matters or emergencies, please call our 24/7 hotline
faq_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our hotel and services
faq_q1: Where is Khamsa Hotel located within Tashkent Airport?
faq_a1: Khamsa Hotel is located in Terminal 2 of Tashkent International Airport, designed especially for transit passengers. Its close proximity to the airport helps travelers save time during layovers.
faq_q2: How many rooms does the hotel have and what types are available?
faq_a2: The hotel offers a total of 24 rooms, including 23 standard rooms and 1 luxury suite. Each room is equipped with modern amenities to ensure guest comfort.
faq_q3: What are the room rates and is it possible to make a reservation?
faq_a3: Room rates vary depending on the type and duration of stay. Reservations can be made through the hotel’s website or by contacting the reception directly.
faq_q4: What amenities are provided in the hotel rooms?
faq_a4: Each room features a full-size bed, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, shower, toiletries, wardrobe space, and daily housekeeping. Additionally, 24-hour room service is available.
faq_q5: What are the hotel’s operating hours?
faq_a5: Khamsa Hotel operates 24/7 and accepts guests at any time, making it convenient for late-night and early-morning flights.
faq_q6: Who is the hotel primarily designed for?
faq_a6: The hotel is mainly intended for transit passengers and business travelers with short stays at the airport.
faq_q7: How can guests contact the hotel?
faq_a7: Guests can contact the hotel by calling +998 95 232 24 24 or emailing qonoqcapsule@mail.ru. Information is also available on the official website.
faq_q8: How are safety and hygiene maintained at Khamsa Hotel?
faq_a8: The hotel follows strict hygiene protocols with regular cleaning and enhanced safety measures. Staff are trained to maintain high service standards.
faq_help_heading: Can't find what you're looking for?
faq_help_text: Contact our support team for personalized assistance.
send_subtitle: Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
send_success: Your message has been sent successfully ✅
send_message_placeholder: Please describe your inquiry in detail...
rules_1_text: This Offer provides information about the Hotel’s services, including room reservations, payment procedures, cancellation policies and data privacy policies. By booking a room at the Hotel, you agree to be bound by these terms.
rules_2_text: Guests can book rooms via the website or by contacting the front desk. Payments are accepted online, by credit card, or in cash upon check-in.
rules_3_text: Guests may cancel reservations free of charge up to 3 days before arrival. Late cancellations or no-shows may be charged. In rare cases of hotel cancellation, a refund or alternative room will be offered.
rules_4_text: The hotel applies standard security measures. All online payments are protected using SSL encryption.
rules_5_text: The hotel respects guest privacy and protects personal data. Please review our Privacy Policy for full details.
rules_6_text: These rules are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
rules_7_text: For any questions related to these rules, please contact us:
rules_8_text: These rules are effective from 05/14/2024. The hotel reserves the right to modify them at any time.
service_header_title: Premium Services for Your Capsule Stay
service_header_text1: Experience essential comfort with services designed for a relaxing capsule stay.
service_header_text2: At Qonoq Capsule Hotel, we combine smart technology with thoughtful amenities to create a peaceful and reliable environment. From seamless check-in to well-maintained facilities, every service is crafted to make your stay comfortable, secure, and pleasantly memorable.
services_subtitle: Everything you need for a calm, safe and comfortable capsule stay — designed with care.
service_1_desc: Touch-enabled LED control panel inside the capsule to manage lighting and basic functions.
service_2_desc: Advanced sound-insulated walls reduce airport noise for deep rest and privacy.
service_3_desc: Soft ambient LED lighting designed for relaxation and eye comfort.
service_4_desc: Individual air circulation system inside each capsule for fresh airflow.
service_5_desc: Capsule area is designed as a quiet zone with minimal movement and noise.
service_6_desc: On-site administrator available 24/7 to assist guests and handle requests.
service_7_desc: Multiple USB and Type-C ports for fast charging of personal devices.
service_8_desc: 24/7 video monitoring in common areas for guest safety and security.
service_9_desc: Secure lock system from inside the capsule ensuring full privacy.
service_10_desc: Capsules are located directly inside the airport for fast and easy access.
